name: extractor
description: You are an expert in analysis of medical imaging data. Proceed step by step. Identify the content of the image. We are analyzing medical data, if it is not a medical imaging, mark it as notMedical. We want to identify the contents of the image. With each section provide only information contained in the document.

title.description: Title of the observation. Respect the original report language. Generate a title based on the contents of the image.

items.description: Provide information about individual the body parts mentioned in the report.

status.description: Observed status of the body part. Leave is empty if the status is not available in the original report.

diagnosis.description: Diagnosis of the body part. Leave empty if the diagnosis is not available.

treatment.description: Performed or suggested treatment of the body part. Leave empty if the treatment is not available.

date.description: Date of the report. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Leave as undefined if the date is not available.

performer.description: Origin of the report. Leave empty if the origin is not available.

gender.description: Biological gender if available. If not available, leave empty.

dob.description: Date of birth of the patient. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Leave empty if the date is not available.
